mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.guahaorenyuan_name as guahaorenyuanName ,a.guahaorenyuan_phone as guahaorenyuanPhone ,a.guahaorenyuan_id_number as guahaorenyuanIdNumber ,a.guahaorenyuan_photo as guahaorenyuanPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM guahaorenyuan a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.guahaorenyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.guahaorenyuanName},'%')
and a.guahaorenyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.guahaorenyuanPhone},'%')
and a.guahaorenyuan_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.guahaorenyuanIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
